title: Dashboard
activityWillAppear: Activity will appear when participants join
hereIsWhatsHappening: Here's what's happening with your flows
getAccessToAllFeatures: Get access to all features and start creating flows today.
paymentFailedDescription: You have {{days}} day(s) to update your payment before your flows are blocked.
flowsBlockedDescription: Your participants cannot access your flows. Update your payment to restore access.
noEarningsYet: Set a price for your flows and start collecting payments. Your earnings will appear here automatically.
paymentLinkPlaceholder: Enter your PayPal or Stripe payment link
externalPaymentDescription: Participants will pay through your external payment link
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
canNowPublishFlow: You can now publish your flow.
couldNotGenerateContent: Could not generate flow content. Please try again.
flowSavedSuccessfully: Your flow has been saved successfully.
flowNowDraft: Your flow is now in draft mode.
aiGeneratingContent: AI is generating personalized content for each day based on your goals and audience...
goalPlaceholder: What will the participant achieve today?
taskPlaceholder: Practical exercise or action for the participant...
contentGenerationFailed: Content generation may have failed. Try refreshing the page.

journeysPage.title: My Flows
journeysPage.subtitle: Manage your transformational flows
journeysPage.noFlowsYet: You haven't created any flows yet.
journeysPage.createFirstFlowDescription: Create your first Flow and start transforming your knowledge into a transformational experience
journeysPage.deleteFlowDescription: This will permanently delete this flow and all its content. This action cannot be undone.

journeyCreate.languageTitle: What language should this Flow be in?
journeyCreate.languageSubtitle: All content and the landing page will be created in this language
journeyCreate.languageTip: For best results, upload content in your chosen language
journeyCreate.shareYourTeachings: Share your teachings, exercises, and materials
journeyCreate.journeyNameTitle: What's the name of your flow?
journeyCreate.journeyNameSubtitle: Give your transformation a memorable name
journeyCreate.clientChallengesTitle: What challenges do your clients face?
journeyCreate.clientChallengesSubtitle: Describe their main pain points and struggles
journeyCreate.clientChallengesPlaceholder: e.g., "Anxiety after breakups, difficulty letting go, fear of being alone"
journeyCreate.mainGoalTitle: What is the main goal of this flow?
journeyCreate.mainGoalSubtitle: What transformation do you want to create?
journeyCreate.mainGoalPlaceholder: e.g., "To help people release emotional pain and find inner peace"
journeyCreate.mainGoalError: Please provide a detailed goal (minimum 10 characters)
journeyCreate.durationSubtitle: Choose the length of the journey
journeyCreate.desiredFeelingTitle: How should users feel at the end?
journeyCreate.additionalNotesSubtitle: Share your vision, energy, or special intentions
journeyCreate.additionalNotesPlaceholder: e.g., "I want it to feel like entering a sacred temple"
journeyCreate.shareContentDescription: To create a personalized digital flow for your clients, we need your unique content and methodology. Share your teachings, exercises, meditations, or any materials you use in your practice.
journeyCreate.uploadDocumentsDescription: Upload PDF or text files containing your teachings, methods, or course materials.
journeyCreate.contentLimitsFiles: Up to 10 files, max 50MB per file
journeyCreate.dropFilesHere: Drop files here or click to browse
journeyCreate.supportsFormats: Supports PDF, Word (DOC/DOCX), and text files
journeyCreate.pasteExistingDescription: Copy and paste text content, meditations, questions, or any written material you've already prepared.
journeyCreate.pasteContentPlaceholder: Paste your content here... This could include meditations, reflection questions, instructions, or any other text-based content for your flow.
journeyCreate.noContentDescription: Please paste your content or upload files before generating.
journeyCreate.couldNotExtractDescription: The files could not be read. Please try pasting the content instead.
journeyCreate.generationError: Failed to generate flow. Please try again.
journeyCreate.textExtractionNote: Text will be extracted from files to generate your Flow

journeySettings.title: Flow Settings
journeySettings.mainGoalPlaceholder: e.g., "To help people release emotional pain from past relationships and find inner peace."
journeySettings.descriptionOptional: Optional - Additional notes or vision for this flow
journeySettings.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., "I want it to feel like entering a sacred temple"

profileCompletion.bannerDescription: Add your expertise and methods to get better AI-generated content for your flows.
profileCompletion.gateDescription: Before creating a flow, please complete your mentor profile. This helps the AI create content that truly reflects your unique style.

profilePage.title: My Profile
profilePage.specialtyPlaceholder: e.g. Life Coach, Therapist, Meditation Teacher
profilePage.methodologyPlaceholder: e.g. Conscious Breathing Method, CBT, NLP, Somatic Therapy
profilePage.uniqueApproachPlaceholder: Describe what makes your approach different from others...
profilePage.aboutYouPlaceholder: Tell participants about yourself and your expertise...
profilePage.premiumPlansComingSoon: Premium plans coming soon with additional features and higher limits.
profilePage.cancelAccountDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all data including:
profilePage.photoAppearInChats: Your photo will appear in chats with participants
profilePage.fileTooLargeDesc: Please upload an image smaller than 5MB.
profilePage.imageUploadedDesc: Your profile picture has been updated.
profilePage.failedToUploadImage: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
profilePage.failedToSaveProfile: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
profilePage.profileSavedDesc: Your details have been updated successfully.
profilePage.nameRequired: First name and last name are required.
profilePage.hebrewNameRequired: Please enter your name in Hebrew only.

feedbackPage.title: Feedback
feedbackPage.subtitle: See what your participants are saying about your flows
feedbackPage.whenParticipantsLeaveFeedback: When participants leave feedback, it will appear here

notificationSettings.title: Notification Settings
notificationSettings.subtitle: Customize when you receive alerts
notificationSettings.savedDescription: Your notification preferences have been updated.
notificationSettings.participantMilestonesDesc: Get notified when participants reach key milestones
notificationSettings.dayCompletedDesc: When a participant completes a day
notificationSettings.flowCompletedDesc: When a participant finishes the entire flow
notificationSettings.inactivityAlertsDesc: Get notified when participants need attention
notificationSettings.inactiveParticipantAlertDesc: When someone hasn't engaged for a while
notificationSettings.allNotificationsSentTo: All notifications will be sent to your registered email address.

trialExpired.title: Trial Period Ended
trialExpired.description: Your 21-day free trial has ended. Subscribe now to continue using Flow83 and keep your flows active.
trialExpired.flowsUnpublished: Your published flows are now hidden
trialExpired.cantEdit: You can't edit or create new flows
trialExpired.subscribeToRestore: Subscribe to restore all your flows and continue growing your business.

participantsTable.title: Participants
participantsTable.subtitle: All participants in your flows
participantsTable.emptyHint: Participants will appear here when they join your flows
participantsTable.name: Name

subscription.choosePlanTitle: Choose a Plan to Activate Your Flow
subscription.choosePlanDescription: You've created something amazing! To publish your flow and start sharing it with clients, choose a plan that fits your needs.
subscription.personalSalesLandingPage: Personal sales landing page for each journey

publishModal.introMessage: A few more steps and you'll get a link to your flow that you can share with your clients
publishModal.step1Description: Decide how much you want to charge for your flow
publishModal.whySetPriceText: This is your work and expertise packaged into a digital experience. You decide its value.
publishModal.freeOption: Free: Great for building your audience and getting testimonials
publishModal.paidOption: Paid: Clients invest in themselves and take the journey more seriously
publishModal.freeDescription: Free - clients can join without payment
publishModal.paidDescription: Clients will pay ${{price}} to access your flow
publishModal.step2DescriptionPaid: Choose how you'd like to receive payments from clients
publishModal.step2DescriptionFree: This step is optional for free flows
publishModal.paymentLinkExplanation: Use your existing PayPal, Stripe Payment Link, or any other payment link. Works from any country - payments go directly to you.
publishModal.paymentRedirectNote: Clients will be redirected to this link to pay, then return to access your flow.
publishModal.enterPaymentLink: Please enter your payment link to continue.
publishModal.freeFlowNote: Your flow is free! No payment setup needed. Click "Skip & Continue" to proceed.
publishModal.step3Description: We'll create a beautiful landing page for your flow
publishModal.miniSiteExplanation: Your mini-site is a professional landing page that presents your flow to potential clients. It includes everything they need to decide to join.
publishModal.miniSiteFeature1: Beautiful design that represents your brand
publishModal.miniSiteFeature2: Clear description of what clients will experience
publishModal.miniSiteFeature3: Easy sign-up and payment process for clients
publishModal.step4Description: Share the link with your clients
publishModal.successDescription: Your Flow has been published successfully
publishModal.otherPaymentDescription: Use an existing payment link from PayPal, Stripe, bit, PayBox or any other provider
